channel.title: Black Bear Pictures on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Black Bear Pictures on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sydney Sweeney Fights for Her Life in Trailer for Boxing Biopic ‘Christy’
item.description: Ben Foster and Merritt Wever also star in David Michôd’s feature that hits theaters this fall after premiering at TIFF.

item.title: Sydney Sweeney Fights for Her Life in Trailer for Boxing Biopic ‘Christy’
item.description: Ben Foster and Merritt Wever also star in David Michôd’s feature that hits theaters this fall after premiering at TIFF.

item.title: Black Bear Names Lionsgate Vet David Spitz Head of U.S. Distribution
item.description: Spitz will assist Teddy Schwarzman’s production and financing company — home of numerous Oscar nominees — as it becomes a full-fledged indie studio.
